updateFavorite

DataLoader updateFavorite(java.lang.String id,
                          Favourite.FavouriteTypeEnum type,
                          DataLoadListener listener)
Mark/unMark merchant / product as favourite

Parameters:
id - id of product if type is product or merchant if type is merchant
type - type if its product or Merchant
listener -
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore
